summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing the Director of Engineering to execute a grant agreement with the U.S. Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) and to proceed with work on an environmental education program; accepting and depositing the grant funds when received; authorizing expert and consultant services; increasing an expenditure allowance in the 1992 Budget of the Seattle Engineering Department; and making appropriations from the Engineering Department Operating and the Solid Waste Funds therefor.
